text: int main ( void ) { int * A [ 100 ] ; int n , k , i ; k = 1 ; int j , sum ; sum = 0 ; int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { A [ i ] = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * k ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < k ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & A [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } k ++ ; } k = n - 1 ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < k ; j ++ ) { if ( A [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > A [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) A [ i ] [ j ] += A [ i + 1 ] [ j ] ; else A [ i ] [ j ] += A [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } k -- ; } k = 1 ; printf ( "\n%d" , A [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
